With this option you allow the App notify you if something change between 8-23 hours.
App developed by students from the University of Alicante for using the UACloud service. This project is not related with the university in any way and has been developed by third persons.
This project is OpenSource with the idea of being transparent and secure. Can be found here:
Error, Unsupported encoding found, Please restart the App
Loading, this can take a while...
Loading profiles, this can take a while...

UNOFFICIAL APP, DEVELOPED BY STUDENTS!!!

READ TERMS AND CONDITIONS BELOW!!!

-About the APP:

This App is unofficial and is not endorsed nor linked to University of Alicante.

Developers aren’t responsable of wrong data nor outdated/bad exposed information. If it were the case, Developers, disinterestedly, would try to correct with patches and updates.

If you install and run this App in your Device, you’re using a version in continuous development, which could have bugs and wrong performance, even loss of functionality.

This App is Free and, in any moment, Developers aren’t forced to give a 100% working version. If there were bugs and errors in the function of the App, Developers could try to fix them. To get easier this task, the App has a Service that informs in failure cases to Developers giving them information about Force Close conditions.

We never collect personal data like user and password.

This App asks for permission to manage network connections and control the storage to access UACloud and download/store its content there present. And it’s possible than the App asks for permission to create shortcuts in user’s Android Launcher for getting easier the access to the App, although it isn't a mandatory option.

-About User’s Account

With the objective of keeping safe as far as possible Users Accounts (referring to the username and password), User’s Account doesn’t go out of the Device (by no way) to Third Party Servers. Nevertheless, User’s Account information goes to the UACloud, and is stored in a database inside App’s own Directory, which are used on every connection to the UACloud.

Despite this information, Developers aren’t responsible of lost and stolen data from User’s Account.

-About the Terms and Conditions:

The Terms and Conditions could change if needed, in which case, Developers reserve the right of applying the changes without further notice, and the fact of not knowing the Terms doesn’t exclude of fullfillment of them.

You can read these Terms in the Login screen and in an shortcut present in "About" screen option.

In case of inconsistency of translations of this Document, always will prevail the Spanish version over the rest.
Here you will be able to access each of the services from UACloud present in the app and if you swipe from the middle to the bottom, all the data and alerts from the Cloud will be updated.
This tool allows you to search for a service present in the app and the next tool allows to update all the data and alerts from the Cloud.
This tool allows you to reload all the data and alerts from the Cloud.
This tool allows to search and download files from the UACloud. As default, it will show first the unseen content but can be changed from the tools on the top.
This tool allows you to read/make Mentorships. By default it will show the unread ones but can be changed from the tools at the top.
This button allows to create a new Mentorship. You can create mentorships from the \"Teachers\" menu too.
Error, you need to accept the conditions in order to connect.
The file will be saved to the folder Downloads/ConnectU!
Seems like you really like the app, cause you have used it like
ConnectU has been developed in native android and it\'s more fluid and responsive.
ConnectU is always been developed and because of that and the users feedback we can make a more user-friendly version.
ConnectU has been developed with the idea of giving a fast tool to manage access to the UACloud in an easy way.

Allows to create a shortcut to Schedule from the android desktop.
This is the schedule, here you can view all the next events and if you click one of them you will get more information about it. It\'s important to confirm events with the UACloud oficial site.
